response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $1,500,000 to me, and I believe it could be equally valuable to you. Considering its worth and the potential benefits it could bring to you, I am offering it to you for $1,200,000. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for high-quality items. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
